outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the Capacity of the Protected Areas System to Address New Challenges (PASS Namibia): Project Objective:  The Protected Area system of Namibia is strengthened and sustainably financed through improving current systems for revenue generation, introduction of  innovative revenue generation mechanisms; and cost effective enforcement through application of the Enforcement Economics Model.

project_descr: Strengthening the Capacity of the Protected Area System to Address New Management Challenges (PASS Namibia) PPG.
project_title: Strengthening Capacities for Protected Area System Mgt
